TASK: Set page margins
DOMAIN: office

STEPS:
1. Open the Format menu to access page layout options
   REASONING: Page margin settings are typically located in the Format menu of office applications like LibreOffice Writer or Microsoft Word
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.05)

2. Wait for the Format menu to expand
   REASONING: Allow time for the menu to fully render before selecting the next option
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

3. Click on "Page" or "Page Setup" option in the Format menu
   REASONING: This option contains all page formatting settings including margins
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.18, y=0.25)

4. Wait for the Page Setup dialog to open
   REASONING: The dialog needs time to load all formatting options and current settings
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

5. Click on the "Page" or "Margins" tab if not already selected
   REASONING: Ensure we're on the correct tab where margin settings are located
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.15)

6. Click on the Top margin input field
   REASONING: To modify the top margin value by selecting the current value
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.55, y=0.30)

7. Clear the current value and enter new top margin
   REASONING: Set a specific top margin value (e.g., 1.0 inch or 2.54 cm)
   ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "a")

8. Type the new top margin value
   REASONING: Input the desired margin measurement
   ACTION: TYPE("1.0")

9. Click on the Bottom margin input field
   REASONING: To set the bottom margin value
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.55, y=0.40)

10. Enter new bottom margin value
    REASONING: Ensure consistent or desired bottom spacing
    ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "a")

11. Type the bottom margin value
    REASONING: Input the desired bottom margin measurement
    ACTION: TYPE("1.0")

12. Click on the Left margin input field
    REASONING: To modify the left margin setting
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.55, y=0.50)

13. Enter new left margin value
    REASONING: Set appropriate left spacing for the document
    ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "a")

14. Type the left margin value
    REASONING: Input the desired left margin measurement
    ACTION: TYPE("1.25")

15. Click on the Right margin input field
    REASONING: To complete margin configuration by setting the right margin
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.55, y=0.60)

16. Enter new right margin value
    REASONING: Set the final margin value for complete page layout
    ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "a")

17. Type the right margin value
    REASONING: Input the desired right margin measurement
    ACTION: TYPE("1.25")

18. Click the OK or Apply button to save the margin settings
    REASONING: Apply the new margin settings to the document and close the dialog
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.70, y=0.85)

19. Wait for the settings to be applied
    REASONING: Allow the application to reformat the document with new margins
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

20. Task completed successfully
    REASONING: All page margins have been configured and applied to the document
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The document's page margins should be successfully updated with the specified values (Top: 1.0", Bottom: 1.0", Left: 1.25", Right: 1.25"). The page layout will be visibly adjusted to reflect the new margin settings, and the Page Setup dialog will be closed.
